1. City Council

City Council
============

* Twice per month, on the second and fourth Tuesday
* City Hall
  2221 N Phillips Ranch Road
  Granite Shoals, TX 78654

### Meetings are open to the public unless otherwise specified and are held in the Council Chambers at City Hall. Individuals wishing to address the Council during a meeting are encouraged to complete a Public Comment Card and submit it to the City Secretary prior to the commencement of the meeting.

### If you are interested in future elections or running for City Council, please visit the Elections page .
